summary:
Fighting adventure in the new locations.
Open entrance of hidden gorge by weird skull.
Go forward and fight against strange guardians until find artifact.

Updated at 25 Sep 2012 - Fix CTD with Dawnguard DLC
descriptionHtml:
Lord of Elements
Developed for Skyrim version 1.7.7.0 (No-Required Dawnguard DLC)

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version1.01 updated at 25 Sep 2012
-Fix CTD with Dawnguard DLC when approach to \"Location of Legend\".


INTRODUCTION
_____________________________
Fighting adventure searching for mysterious artifact in new locations.

One day, You purchased strange skull from a peddler and heard legend from him.
According to the legend, skull is the key that open entrance of hidden gorge where treasure lie.
The treasure is called \"Lord of Elements\".
Entrance seems to exist in a certain area. However, nobody was able to discover it until now.

This is not a dialogue-based quest.
After you enter quest\'s main location, Go ahead and defeat all enemies blocking up your way.

Quest\'s main locations are newly created.
There are 75% outdoor. So you may look different appearance of landscape from my upload images.



STARTING QUEST
_____________________________
For quest start, Travel to Rorikstead.(Halfway point between Whiterun and Markarth)
Get the painted skull named \"Key of Gorge\" that is goods of Khajiit peddler.
Peddler is located on the southern edge of the town(see image).
After getting skull, Follow quest marker that lead you to entrance of quest\'s main location.



DIFFICULTY AND PLAYTIME
_____________________________
Same level and length as Vanilla\'s middle-size dungeon with Unique-Boss.
Creature\'s minimum level is 10, but recommended level of player character are more than 15.
You can lead followers everyplace in quest\'s main locations.



INSTALL AND UNINSTALL
_____________________________
You can easily install & uninstall by using Mod manager like NMM(Nexus Mod Manager).
Simply download .zip file and install it directly.
If you want manual install, unzip download file and copy them to your skyrim/Data folder.
Don\'t miss check all plugins(.esm / .esp) in \"DATA FILES\" section on SKYRIM launcher.



CONSOLE COMMAND
_____________________________
If you have problem about quest start, Type below command in console.
Direct teleport to quest\'s main location Cell.
(This solution don\'t start quest on journal. But not affect to progress, result and reward)

coc saixml02a1



IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE...
_____________________________
Experienced MOD users, Please try basic check before report trouble.
1.Download file is not broken.
2.Install file in right place and check activate.
3.Change load-order.
4.Run MOD on Vanilla environment.
author: saixml
